meanings.definition: An area where a fair or carnival is held.
meanings.sent1: The fairgrounds were filled with colorful tents and exciting rides.
meanings.sent2: We had a great time exploring the fairgrounds and trying all the delicious food.
meanings.sent3: The fairgrounds looked like a magical wonderland with all the bright lights and decorations.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the fairgrounds brighter than any of the carnival lights.
meanings.sent5: Children's laughter echoed through the fairgrounds, creating a joyful atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The grounds or location where a fair takes place.
meanings.sent1: We set up our booth at the fairgrounds early in the morning.
meanings.sent2: Visitors from all over the town gathered at the fairgrounds for the annual event.
meanings.sent3: The fairgrounds transformed into a bustling marketplace with vendors selling their goods.
meanings.sent4: The fairgrounds buzzed with excitement as people eagerly awaited the start of the fair.
meanings.sent5: The fairgrounds stretched far and wide, offering plenty of space for different attractions.
